name: Tutankhamon
description: Tutankhamon (AKA King Tut) by Pyramid Seeds has kept the sour, skunky smell of its parent strain, AK-47, as well as the sativa-dominant effects, making it a great choice for social outings or creative stimulation. This strain has built a reputation for having high THC levels, and the flavor has hints of fresh fruit and flowers that make this beautiful bud fit for a king!
attributes_title: Uplifted, Focused, Happy, Energetic, Euphoric, Depression, Stress, Nausea, Pain, Insomnia, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Anxious, Dizzy, Paranoid
